en-US.name: Spelling contest
en-US.description:
Spelling contest

Test your English. Join the contest for your English understanding. 

Say "my name is" and your name to join the contest, then ask Alexa to start a game. If needed, you can tell Alexa to repeat, and she will do it slowly. 
 * Alexa gives the word to listen to one letter at a time. Answer the full word to complete the challenge. 
 * Alexa also says numbers one digit at a time 

Change your name at any time between questions to let your friends joining the contest. 

Next features in the pipe:  access to a leaderboard. Do not hesitate to provide feedback and ideas on what you would like to see in the game!

publishingInformation.testingInstructions:
The skill spells words and digits, and expect the user to tell the full word or number. 

The skill can start spelling words and numbers once you gave your name. You can change your name between 2 questions but not before answering the current question. 

The skill can repeat a question, it will do it will be slower than the 1st time.
